ConfirmQuit.en-us:
Are you sure you want to exit? All
 progress will be lost.

ConfirmResetMessage.en-us:
Are you sure you want
to erase all progress?

StoryIntro1.en-us:
It's the 2021 Starlight Jingle Bell Concert!
They have called Molly McGee to help with
 the show!

StoryIntro2.en-us:
Turns out keeping the crowd happy in Lightfoot
is harder than Molly imagined!

StoryIntro3.en-us:
Enlist the help of Ron the Robot to complete tasks,
solve problems, and keep the crowd happy
to make this talent week one for the ages!

DayFailed.en-us:
You failed to keep the crowd happy
 before the end of the day!

FixerAbilityDescription.en-us:
Ron tries to fix an
area that needs help!
 Success Rate: %N%!

MoodAbilityDescription.en-us:
Ron stops the
Mood Meter from
decreasing for
%N seconds!

GameComplete.en-us:
Good work! Youâ€™ve made it through talent week in one piece and
kept the town's spirit alive along the way! Earn three stars on each
day to unlock an Encore!

GameCompleteEndurance.en-us:
Amazing work! You have completed the Starlight Concert week! 
People are already buying tickets for next year!

TutCoupons1.en-us: Alright, I think we're ready for Day 1 of our concert!

TutCoupons2.en-us: Eh, there's room for improvement. I mean, Doja won't be enough.

TutCoupons4.en-us: We need to think of more artists to bring in to the concert!

TutCoupons5.en-us: You know, people like, I don't know, freaking Billie Eilish!

TutCoupons6.en-us: Oh! I've got an idea! We can advertise the concert!

TutCoupons7.en-us: Uhh, how are we going to do that?

TutCoupons8.en-us: Advertising! Let's bring out brochures for people to share to their friends!

TutCoupons9.en-us: Gee. I haven't thought of that.

TutCouponsBody.en-us: Tap the table to walk over and start making brochures! You can only hold a few brochures at a time!

TutCouponsGoal.en-us: Goal: Give each crowd member a brochure!

TutGuestsBody.en-us: Tap a crowd member to give them a brochure! Deliver brochures to build happiness!

TutFix1.en-us: I did it! Look at the crowd! They're so happy!

TutFix3.en-us: WHAT?! Oh my goodness, I gotta fix that!

TutFixBody1.en-us: Broken stations have a yellow or red icon above them. Stations with a red icon deplete your happiness meter!

TutFixBody2.en-us: Tap a broken station or its icon to visit it! Complete its activity to fix it and restore happiness!

TutMood1.en-us: Alright! The Jingle Ball is back in business! Now to sit back, relax, and enjoy our success!

TutMood4.en-us: All the new crowd members look... grumpy? Annoyed? Exasperated? No, let's go with grumpy. You should get back out there!

TutMoodBody.en-us: Max out the crowd happiness meter before time runs out to complete the day!

TutMoodGoal.en-us:
Goal: Deliver coupons & fix stations
to max out the happiness meter!

TutFood1.en-us: Ya know, Ron, a little help here would be nice!

TutFood2.en-us: I've seen what you're doing, and it is NOT for me, thank you!

TutFood3.en-us: Okay, I guess I'll just have to give all this extra gizmos I keep finding to Vincent then!

TutFood4.en-us: Wait, what? Slow down there, Molly. I was joking. It was a joke! Just a robot joke! It's what we do!

TutFood5.en-us: Tell you what, snatch me enough gizmos, and I might just be willing to help!

TutScratchBody.en-us: Collect phones to unlock Ron's abilities! Tap an ability's icon to activate it!

TutEncore.en-us: Welcome to the Jingle Ball Encore! Keep everything in working order for as long as you can. The show keeps rockin' while the crowd is happy!

TutSuperfood.en-us: Does Ron need some extra persuasion? Collect batteries to instantly charge him up!

ScratchMeterReminder.en-us:
Get fixing McGee!
The Jingle Ball needs your help!

ScratchCouponReminder.en-us: You gotta make more brochures, kiddo!

ScratchTimeReminder.en-us: The day is almost over! Get moving!

ScratchCouldntFix.en-us: Sorry, McGee! I couldn't fix it!
